trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_SEQ_00<tab>Caur needs the help of a strong <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a tent pillar from the ruined tent.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tent pillar to Caur.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_000<tab>Could I ask you to help with repairing our tent?
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_001<tab>The central pillar propping it up has been steadily weakening over the recent months and I worry it will not hold out much longer.

TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_002<tab>However, the other day I noticed that there is a perfectly good pillar just south of here. You will find it amongst the remains of a Kahkol tent destroyed by the Buduga.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_003<tab>There is another pillar just south of here. You will find it amongst the remains of a Kahkol tent destroyed by the Buduga.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_010<tab>Were you able to find the pillar?
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_011<tab>Oh, thank you! This should hold for many a year yet.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_012<tab>We never lack for wool to make tent covers, but finding solid tree trunks to serve as pillars is not quite as straightforward.
TEXT_STMBDZ518_02769_CAUR_000_013<tab>You have truly done us a great service. Thank you.
